name: GET A GRIP
description:
Small arcadish game I made in python using pygame for ScoreJam #24.

You must GET A GRIP and avoid causing an akward handshake. A sort of reaction based game where you must shake the hands and bump the incoming fists! Your live on TV so best not slip up!! 

I started super late so its not as polished as I'd like but turned out pretty cool for my first ever game jam!

Controls:

UP ARROW - Move Up

DOWN ARROW - Move Down

SPACEBAR - Switch between shake & bump
